text.english: Teorema: Interaction between \(\texttt{sumList}\) and \(\texttt{app}\), i.e. \[ \forall l_1,l_2 \in L_\mathbb{N} . \; \texttt{sumList}(\texttt{app}(l_1,l_2)) = \texttt{sumList}(l_1) + \texttt{sumList}(l_2) \]
text.italiano: Teorema: Interazione fra \(\texttt{sumList}\) e \(\texttt{app}\), i.e. \[ \forall l_1,l_2 \in L_\mathbb{N} . \; \texttt{sumList}(\texttt{app}(l_1,l_2)) = \texttt{sumList}(l_1) + \texttt{sumList}(l_2) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem sumList_app: forall l1 l2 : listn , sumList (app l1 l2)  = sumList l1 + sumList l2.
